version_description:
- iOS7 compatible
- UI renewal
- Grouping movies with tag
- Pro mode( few UI & gesture operations )
- Full function time
minor fix
fix crash issue

fix: some movie list bugs
update: save function for player state

NEW DESIGN! NEW FEATURES!
- Video list: Sort, Filter, List/Grid mode
- Video player: Scale, Multi-frame shot
- Dual video player: Layout mode, Multi-frame shot

-Add: Flip mode
-Add: Ad-Free option
-Change: Support form
-Change: Location-based service warning
-Fix: Play/Pause display issue

Improvement: The speed of displaying video cells at video list
Fix: Portrait / Landscape videos mixed-enabled dual player
Fix: iPod video display

Fix: Not displaying movie duration in movie list
Fix: Ads issue
Fix: Thumbnail update issue

Fix: some issues
Add: Restore for purchased users(in old version)
Add: iCloud movies support

Improvement: add confirm popup before downloading iCloud movie
Improvement: support single touch pan in movie scale setting
Fix: Slow-motion video is misidentified as iCloud video
Fix: iTunes shared videos is not displayed

Add: Grid view in player
Fix: some minor bugs

Fix: crash bug in dual player
Improvement: some minor issues

Added: Back to head ( in play range ) function
Added: Size & FPS in Movie info screen
Improved: Guide line appearance
Fixed: some minor bugs

* Perfectly adapted to iPhone X
* New design!
* Fixed a lot of bugs
- Various bug fixes

- added: iCloud sharing videos support!!
- fixed: some minor bugs

fix: slo-mo videos support
add: version notation
Fix some bugs
fix "Shot" function

add: Restoring last playback settings
improve: Appearance in playback screen
improve: Speed ​​of thumbnail bar display of playback screen
fix: Problems importing from other applications
fix: Problems concerning playback speed during fast forward
fix: Problems related to comparison playback in in-app moving pictures
fix: Some localizations
fix: some bugs

Add: Keep zoom setting for specific video
Fix: Decrease in speed of displaying video list when large amount of video exist
Fix: minor bug

- UI renewal
- Add: Delayed playback(Record & Play)
- Add: annual payment

- fix: screen updating when deleting movie(File)
- fix: scrubbing when updating movie thumbnail
- fix: play range
- fix: video importing

fix: Behavior when scrubbing during video playback
change: Expanded playable speed range

- Major enhancements in Pro functions
- Add a free trial of Pro functions
- Avoid crashing on some video loads
- Some other improvements

fix: a problem that it works in conjunction with "overwrite silent mode" ON even if "background playback" is not ON
